description:
AJKB-08 EMBROIDERED CHIFFON 3 PCS

By Pcs: 3 Pcs Peshwas: Chiffon Trouser: Silk Dupatta: Chiffon Color: Dark Brown

Radiating elegance in a rich mahogany hue, this ensemble captures timeless allure. The embroidered Peshwas, an artful masterpiece features antique gold zariwork that weaves gracefully throughout, adding a vintage charm, while 5mm flat sequins and 3mm cupped antique gold sequins shimmer delicately across the fabric. Embroidered with deep maroon, sage green, and soft pink threads, along with gold lurex accents, the intricate detailing brings depth and sophistication to the design. Paired with an embroidered dupatta, this creation transforms into a masterpiece of refined beauty, making a statement of enduring elegance.
DESIGN DETAILS:

Pair of embroidered front bodice on chiffon
Embroidered back bodice on chiffon
Embroidered back neckline on chiffon
2 meter embroidered border for bodice hem on chiffon
16 embroidered kalis for peshwas on chiffon
2 embroidered right & left kalis for front on chiffon
4 meter embroidered border for ghera on net
Pair of embroidered sleeves with border on chiffon
2.5 meter embroidered dupatta with 4-side border on chiffon
1.5 meter wide-width silk for trouser
